# Node.js and npm logs
# Ignore node_modules/ directory which contains all packages.
node_modules/
# Ignore npm and yarn debug logs.
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Logs
# Ignore all log files.
logs/
*.log
*.log.*

# Runtime data
# Ignore runtime process ID and lock files.
pids/
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Directory for instrumented libs generated by jscoverage/JSCover
# Ignore coverage directories used by coverage tools like istanbul.
lib-cov/

# Coverage directory
coverage/

# Grunt intermediate storage
# Ignore storage used by Grunt task runner.
.grunt/

# Compiled source
# Ignore compiled class and cache directories for sass and scss.
*.class
*.sass-cache/
*.scss-cache/
*.css.map
*.css
*.less

# Static files
# Ignore static files directory if applicable.
static/

# Dependency directories
# Ignore directories for Bower and JSPM package management.
bower_components/
jspm_packages/

# TypeScript compiled output
# Ignore TypeScript build info and distribution directories.
*.tsbuildinfo
dist/
dist-ssr/
*.local
*.release
out/
.out/

# TSLint
# Ignore TSLint cache.
tslint.cache

# Docker
# Ignore Docker files if applicable.
Dockerfile
docker-compose.yml

# Snyk
# Ignore Snyk security vulnerability reports.
.snyk

# Optional npm cache directory
# Ignore ESLint cache.
.eslintcache

# Optional ESLint cache
# Ignore npm cache directory.
.npm/

# Project build directories
# Ignore cache, temporary, and build directories.
.cache/
tmp/
temp/
build/
*.exe
*.out
*.
